	+ Why you are interested in Deloitte and the role as a consultant
	+ What you think you can contribute with and bring to the role
* Grade copies from college/university


**Please submit your application as soon as possible, as we work with ongoing selection.** 
  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/* 
  

  

**Questions?** 
  

 If you have any questions regarding the role or the application process, please contact Rasmus Öhman, Talent Acquisition Specialist, at rohman@deloitte.se.
   

  

**We are looking forward to your application!** 
  

  

 For further information on Deloitte, please visit www.deloitte.se
   

  

  


**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Utveckla din IT-karriär hos Centric!
description:
Vi söker engagerade supporttekniker till flera av våra kunder. Har du tidigare arbetat något år inom IT eller är du nyexaminerad från gymnasiet med erfarenhet av praktik inom IT och nu redo att komma ut i arbetslivet? Är du som person serviceinriktad, gillar att vara social i arbetet och har ett stort intresse för IT, datorer och nätverk? Då är du av stort intresse för oss!
   

  

 När du anställs hos oss ser vi en långsiktighet hos dig, vilket innebär att du kommer axla flera olika uppdrag hos oss. När du väl har arbetat hos oss på Centric i 2-3 år har du möjligheten att växa och ta ytterligare ett steg i din yrkeskarriär tillsammans med oss.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Du kommer att inta rollen som first line supporttekniker tillsammans med ett team. Som supporttekniker arbetar du med både mail och telefonkommunikation. I rollen ingår det även att registrera samt ta emot inkommande ärenden i ett ärendehanteringssystem. Du kommer bland annat att hantera användare i Active Directory och Microsoft 365 samt ge support via fjärrstyrning.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 Som person ser vi att du är social, lösningsorienterad och har ett genuint intresse för teknik. Du är självgående och tar egna initiativ samt vill ständigt utvecklas. Du motiveras av att ge bra service och har en god kommunikativ förmåga. Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska flytande.
   

  

**Krav**
* Minst 6 månaders erfarenhet av praktisk IT-support
* Gått IT-gymnasium eller kurser inom IT
* God känsla för service
* God teknisk kunskap


*Meriterande*
* Active Directory
* Office 365
* Microsoft 365
* Windows operativsystem


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Produktägare / tech lead digitala plattformar till Världsnaturfonden WWF
description:
De digitala kanalerna är centrala för Världsnaturfonden WWF för att driva engagemang och tillväxt samt för bilden av WWF. Vi söker nu dig som vill bidra till utvecklingsinitiativ och kvalitetsförbättringar i det dagliga engagemangs- och konverteringsarbetet genom att operativt arbeta med och i våra digitala verktyg, främst vår webbplats.
   

  

 I rollen har du ansvar för att identifiera, prioritera, koordinera och driva utvecklingssatsningar med fokus på att stärka både innehåll och infrastruktur för kommunikation och insamling via digitala plattformar. Arbetet görs i nära samarbete med webbgrupp, extern webbyrå och andra samarbetspartners.
   

  

 Du blir ansvarig för tekniken på WWFs webbplatser och digitala tjänster, samt är produktägare för kommunikationsverktyg. Du är kravställare till leverantörer och säkrar GDPR. Koordinering av arbetet med våra servrar, pixlar, SST etc tillsammans med WWFs it-avdelning är också vanliga uppgifter.
   

  

 Tjänsten tillhör vår Kommunikationsavdelning men du kommer även operativt stötta Insamlingsavdelningen och arbeta nära andra specialister inom till exempel innehållsproduktion, insamling, kampanjer och teknikutveckling.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter/ansvarsområden:**
* Systemutveckling – koordinera utvecklingsarbete med interna och externa arbetsgrupper, arbeta med uppdatering och optimering av digitala produkter.
* Tekniska utvecklingsinitiativ utifrån strategier, webbanalys, samhällets teknikutveckling och lagkrav
* Analys och rapportering av data samt sätta upp och följa nyckeltal
* Utgöra ett tekniskt stöd för webbansvarig på wwf.se (nya sidor, förbättringar, SEO, formulär mm). Samt bidra till att höja kompetensen internt kring dessa frågor
* Ansvara för utvalda naturvårdsprojekt som rör teknik runt exempelvis webbkameror och annan teknisk lösning på wwf.se
* Teknik- och systemansvarig för ett antal kommunikations- och insamlingsverktyg, där säkring av GDPR, lagkrav och hantering av betal- och signeringsmetoder ingår, samt att driva arbetet mot headless.
* Operativa uppdrag i kommunikations- och insamlingsprojekt
* Bevaka utvecklingen inom betalösningar- och signeringsmetoder


 Vi söker dig som är van av att jobba med digitala plattformar utifrån ett engagemangs- och konverteringsfokus, gärna med bakgrund inom e-handel. Kombination av teknik och innehåll. Du har erfarenhet av produktägarskap och systemansvar och har en god förståelse för utveckling tillsammans med externa samarbetspartners. För att du ska lyckas och trivas i rollen krävs att du är självgående och har mycket god förmåga att koordinera och prioritera utvecklingssatsningar samt stötta interna kollegor. Du har kunskap inom webbanalys och konverteringsoptimering och behärskar verktyg som Google Analytics/Matomo, Looker Studio och Google Tag Manager. Det är också värdefullt om du har erfarenhet av SEO liksom tillgänglig webb.
   

  

 Som person är du noggrann och strukturerad och har lätt för att samarbeta och bygga relationer såväl internt som externt. Du trivs med stort ansvar och har lätt att prioritera för att nå uppsatta mål.
   

  

**För att passa i rollen behöver du ha följande bakgrund:**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta systematiskt och holistiskt med digital utveckling
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med komplexa tekniska lösningar med många och stora beroenden mellan olika system.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta proaktivt med lösningsförslag baserade på behov.
* Erfarenhet av att paketera och beställa Webb/IT leveranser av externa IT leverantörer (upphandling, offerter, projektupplägg, leveransgodkännande, kvalitetssäkring mm)
* Kompetens och erfarenhet av API-hantering, HTML och cookies (datasäkerhet)
* Goda kunskaper av användarcentrerad och sökordsoptimerade kampanjer samt goda kunskaper och erfarenheter att arbeta med innehåll i WordPress och med verktyg som Google Ads, A/B-testning mm
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift samt en bra känsla för text och bild
* Grundläggande tekniska kunskaper, förståelse för CRM och för flerkanalsstrategi.


**WWF erbjuder:**
 Medarbetarna är vår viktigaste resurs och vi strävar efter att bli en av Sveriges mest eftertraktade arbetsplatser. Därför är det viktigt för oss att fokusera på inkluderande arbetsmiljö med fokus på ökad mångfald, hälsa och friskvård, tillsammans med strategisk kompetensutveckling och spännande utvecklingsmöjligheter.
   

  

 Vi är en lärande organisation och fokuserar på att stötta och coacha våra medarbetare så att deras inre motivation och drivkraft kommer till sin rätt. Det gör vi genom exempelvis föreläsningar, tvärgrupper och forum utöver medarbetarens individuella kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 Vi tror att en ökad flexibilitet i arbetstidens förläggning är en viktig del i livspusslet och erbjuder därför alla medarbetare flextid, förkortad arbetstid eller möjlighet till 50% distansarbete. WWF Sveriges kontor finns i vackert belägna Ulriksdals Slott med vattnet alldeles utanför fönstren. Du kommer att få arbeta med kompetenta medarbetare i en stimulerande miljö. WWF tillämpar ett aktivitetsbaserat arbetssätt, är anslutet till kollektivavtal och följer ITP 1 planen.
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om WWF som arbetsplats? Läs vidare här: WWF som arbetsplats - WWF
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid.
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 Så snart som möjligt.
   

  

**Varaktighet:** 
 Tills vidare. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

**Stationeringsort:** 
 Solna, Ulriksdals slott. Det finns också möjlighet till arbete på annan plats, exempelvis hemifrån, upp till 50 %.
   

  

**Kontakt:**
 Namn: Åsa Thulin
   

  

 Titel: Tillförordnad avdelningschef Kommunikation
   

  

 Epost: asa.thulin@wwf.se
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt dock senast 2025-06-06. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 Har du frågor om rekryteringsprocessen? Kontakta: Ecaterina Cavieres, People & Culture på WWF via växeln 08-624 74 00 eller på ecaterina.cavieres@wwf.se.
   

  

**Facklig representant**
 Namn: Unionen, Akademikerförbundet Facklig representant.
   

  

 Telefon: Växelnummer 08-624 74 00
   

  

*Världsnaturfonden WWF arbetar aktivt för att alla anställda ska ha samma möjligheter och rättigheter oavsett ålder, etnisk eller kulturell bakgrund, könsidentitet och könsuttryck, religion/tro, sexuell läggning eller funktionsförutsättning.*
 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: IT Consultant - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for IT Consultants who will collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on local and international client projects!
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* have a degree in computer science, informatics, business with focus on IT, or a related field
* gathered approx. two years of relevant experience in IT consulting (part or full time)
* are no stranger to the buzzwords machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile, AI, and robotics
* enjoy tackling complex digital challenges and are enthusiastic about developing and sharing solutions
* feel comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Shape the digital future of globally leading companies in an individual client context with overarching technical solutions
* Develop groundbreaking projects by enabling your clients to effectively use agile methods and modern approaches in the context of strategic IT implementation
* Smooth the path for tailored, future-oriented customer journeys based on precise analyses of the individual situation and with current market developments and trends such as machine learning in mind
* Design and optimize unique IT architectures within the framework of enterprise solution requirements, modern custom software developments, and sustainable digital solutions, including cyber resilience


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Drifttekniker & IT-konsult
description:
**Förstärkning till vårt IT-Drift och Konsult-team på Further** 





 Vi söker passionerade personer som vill vara en viktig del av vårt IT-Drift- och Konsult-team och bidra till vår fortsatta framgång.
 





 Har du en bakgrund inom IT-drift eller som IT-konsult och en god teknisk kunskap inom Microsoft 365 och Azure? Trivs du i en kommersiell miljö och stimuleras av möjligheten att bidra till ett bolags tillväxt? Då kan vi vara rätt arbetsplats för dig!
 




  





**Om Further** 





 Vi är övertygade om att framgång byggs på nöjda kunder och vi strävar alltid efter att stärka våra kunders konkurrenskraft genom att erbjuda pålitliga och innovativa tjänster och teknologier. Vi värdesätter starka och långsiktiga relationer, schyssta affärer och skräddarsydda lösningar som svarar direkt på våra kunders behov. Vi har under många år hjälpt våra kunder att förbättra sina IT-miljöer genom innovativa lösningar och pålitlig service.
 





 Vi är en prestigelös, familjär arbetsplats där vi uppmuntrar personlig utveckling. Vi arbetar oftast från kontoret, men även ibland ute hos kund. Flexibilitet finns att arbeta på distans några dagar i veckan för att få ihop livspusslet.
 





 Vårt kontor i Kista bjuder på en modern och trivsam arbetsmiljö, med utmärkta kommunikationsmöjligheter för både tunnelbana, pendeltåg, cykel och bil och vi har reserverade parkeringsplatser precis utanför kontoret.
 




  





**Om tjänsten** 





 Vi är Microsoftpartner så det mesta vi gör cirkulerar kring Microsoft 365 och Azure. I rollen ingår du i vårt IT-Drift- och Konsultteam där ni tillsammans ansvarar för drift och underhåll och utveckling av våra kunders IT-miljöer som oftast består av MS365 Tenants, nätverk, Azure/Windowsservrar och andra verksamhetssystem.
 





 En typisk arbetsdag kan inkludera allt från att hantera akuta tekniska problem till att planera och implementera långsiktiga förbättringar i kundernas IT-miljöer. Vi söker dig med bred teknisk kompetens och erfarenhet av drift av olika Microsoftlösningar samt kringliggande infrastruktur.
 




  





**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Arbeta tillsammans med teamet för att förbättra och vidareutveckla våra driftkunders miljöer, ofta i dialog med beställaren hos våra kunder.
* Hantera den dagliga driften av kunders IT-miljö/infrastruktur, företrädelsevis Microsoft 365 och närbesläktade tjänster.
* Delta i, eller leda projekt. Exempelvis implementering av nya kunder eller förändringsprojekt hos befintliga kunder.



  





**Om dig** 





 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du kommer från en liknande miljö med erfarenhet från antingen IT-drift eller IT-konsulting. Du besitter god kunskap om Microsoft 365, Microsoft Azure, nätverk och brandväggar. Du pratar svenska och engelska flytande samt har möjlighet att arbeta på plats på vårt kontor i Kista den största delen av tiden. Vi söker en lagspelare med stark problemlösningsförmåga och en vilja att ständigt lära sig och utvecklas.
 




**Viktigt för tjänsten är att du:** 



* Har flera års erfarenhet av systemadministration av Microsoft 365/Azuremiljöer.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.
* Är kundfokuserad, kommunikativ, prestigelös och intresseras av nya teknologier.



  






 Du har förmodligen dessutom några av följande kompetenser/erfarenheter:
 





 - Windows Server
 





 - 
 

 Infrastruktur såsom WiFi, LAN och brandväggar.
 





 - 
 

 Sharepoint online
 





 - 
 

 Power Automate
 





 - 
 

 Power Plattform
 





 - 
 

 Powershell
 





 - 
 

 Intune/Autopilot/Lighthouse
 





 - 
 

 Microsoft Copilot/Copilot Studio
 




  






 Vi är väldigt positiva till certifieringar och uppmuntrar alla till att ha det som mål.
 




  





**Företagets erbjudande** 





 Vi erbjuder en konkurrenskraftig lön samt en möjlighet att få komma till ett bolag där du blir en viktig del av vår verksamhet och får vara med och påverka. Vi har friskvårdsbidrag på 5000kr, tjänstepension samt tillgång till gym.
 




  





**Övrigt** 



* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid, 100%
* Placering: Kista
* Lön: Fast lön




 Låter det intressant? Vi tillämpar ett löpande urval, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan. I denna rekrytering kommer stor vikt även att läggas på personliga egenskaper. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Director, Business Operations (ERP)
company_industry: Technology, Information and Internet, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Computer and Network Security
description:
Meet
 
 Yubico
 
 : the inventor of the
 
 YubiKey
 
 ––the world's first and leading security key. Our company’s mission is to make secure login easy and available for everyone. Yubico was founded in 2007 by Stina and Jakob Ehrensvard, and recently went public on Nasdaq Stockholm Main Market: YUBICO. Our customers include Fortune 500 companies, hundreds of government agencies and millions of individuals in over 160 countries that rely on Yubico technology to secure access to computers, online services and mobile apps. We  are a global company with a strong company culture and employees located in over 14 countries. Yubico’s  headquarters are based in  Stockholm, Sweden and Santa Clara, CA.  Aligned with our mission to make the internet more secure for everyone, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations helping at-risk individuals through our philanthropic initiative,
 
 Secure it Forward
 
 .
 




  





**At Yubico, we offer:**




  





**Yubico Values:
 
 We work to ensure that our employees have an open space to have their voices amplified to create a workplace where everyone feels like they belong. Aligned with this, our employees have created some pretty cool Employee Resource Groups: YubiPride, YubiBIPOC, YubiSustainability and YubiWomen. Additionally, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations in need all over the world (you can read more about our work here).
 

  





**Social Connection:**

 Relationships and connectedness matter, and we love spending time with our team! Our virtual workspace keeps us connected day-to-day whether it's through Yubico celebrating wins or our buzzing Slack communities. We host an all-team event in a new location every year where we plan for upcoming quarters, set goals, and most importantly, host fun events to encourage team building outside of the workplace. Check out our
 

 Life at Yubico Page
 

 on LinkedIn and our awards
 

 here
 
**.**




  





**The Role:
 
  






 We are seeking an experienced Director, Business Operations (ERP) to join our Business Operations team. As a Director, Business Operations (ERP), you will be responsible for managing the NetSuite product backlog, prioritizing based on business impact, feasibility, and strategic objectives.
 




  






 The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of core business processes, such as Order to Cash, Procure to Pay, Record to Report, Financial Reporting, and Inventory Management. They will also possess strong leadership skills, with experience leading Agile development efforts and collaborating with technical teams.
 




  






 Business Operations is a global team where you will lead the evolution of our ERP platforms (e.g., Avalara, NetSuite, WMS), driving key strategic initiatives that impact the entire organization. We are a collaborative and high-growth environment, partnering with talented teams across multiple functions. Here you will gain exposure to cutting-edge ERP solutions, integrations, and business process automation.
 





  




**Tasks & Responsibilities:** 
* Managing a team of NetSuite developers and administrators, overseeing integrations, and ensuring the security and integrity of ERP data
* Owning and managing the ERP platform strategy and roadmap, ensuring alignment with business goals and scalability needs
* Serving as the primary product owner for NetSuite within the organization, working closely with cross-functional teams to define system requirements and implement best-in-class solutions
* Leading Agile development efforts, leading sprint planning, daily standups, backlog grooming, retrospectives, and stakeholder demos
* Maintaining and continuously refining the ERP product backlog, prioritizing based on business impact, feasibility, and strategic objectives
* Acting as the key liaison between finance, operations, supply chain, sales, IT, and executive leadership, gathering business requirements, translating them into technical specifications, and ensuring solutions meet business needs
* Defining and document business processes, system workflows, and functional requirements to optimize ERP performance
* Collaborating with enterprise architects, developers, and system administrators to design, test, and deploy enhancements, integrations, and customizations
* Identifying and driving process improvements and automation initiatives, ensuring that NetSuite is leveraged effectively to enhance operational efficiency and reduce manual effort
* Ensuring seamless integrations between NetSuite and other enterprise applications (e.g., Salesforce) by defining integration requirements and collaborating with technical teams
* Partnering with finance, tax, and compliance teams to ensure NetSuite meets regulatory requirements and supports audit readiness
* Developing and delivering training, documentation, and change management strategies, ensuring business users effectively adopt and utilize NetSuite capabilities
* Providing regular reporting and updates to leadership on NetSuite performance, roadmap progress, key initiatives, and risks
* Managing relationships with third-party vendors, system integrators, and implementation partners, ensuring successful project execution and ongoing platform support
* Evaluating and recommending new features, technologies, and third-party applications that enhance ERP functionality and align with business objectives
* Leveraging data and analytics to drive decision-making, optimize system usage, and improve reporting capabilities



  




**Basic Qualifications:** 
* Exceptional leadership abilities, demonstrated through effective team management and attaining project objectives with outstanding outcomes
* Possession of a strategic mindset, enabling the translation of business requirements into technical solutions that drive enduring success in NetSuite implementations
* Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, facilitating seamless collaboration with stakeholders across all organizational levels
* BS Degree or additional amount of experience in lieu of a degree
* Minimum of 6 years' experience in a Product Owner, ERP Manager, Business Systems Analyst, or related role with a strong focus on ERP
* 4 years' experience working with tools such as JIRA and ServiceNow
* Consulting or working experience with ERP supply chain applications (particularly Inventory and Manufacturing) is required



  




**Bonus Qualifications:** 
* Extensive knowledge of NetSuite configuration, workflows, saved searches, reporting, scripting capabilities and integrations
* Deep understanding of core business processes such as Order to Cash, Procure to Pay, Record to Report, Financial Reporting, and Inventory Management
* Ability to analyze complex business problems, define clear requirements, and translate them into effective NetSuite solutions
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a data-driven approach to decision-making
* ERP Consultant and/or SuiteFoundation Certification
* Scrum master certification or experience






  




  














  





 We are an equal opportunity employer, we value diversity and uphold an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law. We'd love to learn about what you can add to our diverse team.
 



  





 Yubico does not accept agency resumes or referrals so please do not send them to our careers staff or employees. Yubico is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes or referrals.
 



  





 Personal data submitted through this form is used for managing Yubico’s recruitment activities, which include facilitating any application you make, setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing results and selecting candidates, and as otherwise needed in our recruitment and onboarding processes. The use of your personal data may also be necessary prior to entering into a contract with you (that is prior to offering you a job with Yubico). Your personal data will only be used for the purposes for which it was collected and in accordance with the Yubico Privacy Notice. We only keep your personal data for as long as necessary and in compliance with Yubico’s record retention policies. If you have asked us to, we will keep you informed of other opportunities at Yubico. We do this in various ways, including email and by phone. If at any time you do not want us to contact you or use your information as described herein please contact us at jobs@yubico.com to let us know and we will delete all such information. Providing your personal data is voluntary, but necessary to join our talent community, and if you do not agree to provide your data, we will not be able to consider you as part of our talent community.
 



  





 As part of providing the requested service, we will transfer your data to be processed by Lever, Inc., a service provider contracted by Yubico AB and/or its subsidiaries that meets legally mandated privacy requirements. The Yubico Privacy Notice offers more information about Yubico privacy practices, including the lawful basis for processing of personal data, how to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority, and how to contact Yubico to exercise your data subject rights. In this notice, when we refer to "Yubico", "us", "we" or "our", we mean the Yubico group company or companies that you apply to, or correspond with, and which are responsible for any personal data collected about you.****

title: Business Controller
description:
At BMW Group, everything starts with passion. It turns a profession into a vocation. It drives us to keep reinventing mobility and bring innovative ideas onto the roads. Enthusiasm for joint projects turns a team into a strong unit where every opinion is valued. It is only when expertise, highly professional processes and enjoyment of work unite that we can shape the future together.
 



  





 As a Business Controller for BMW Financial Services, you will be responsible for steering one of the 3 markets in terms of: Profit Contribution Margin, Penetration rate and overall result. Providing to the management and market stakeholders periodical analysis of performance with analytical deep dive to gain market insights and look for additional opportunities in a profit/volume-oriented way.
 



  





**What awaits you?** 



* Become center of the business steering and controls: establish granular reports, find opportunities, solve challenges.
* Be independent and being able to analyze performance and see deviations
* Work in tight collaboration within the team.
* Stay always connected to business partners.
* Collaborate with headquarters in terms of standards, processes and central requirements.
* Maintain best quality of planning and actuals reporting for dedicated area of responsibility, communicate with market stakeholders and management.



  





**What should you bring along?** 



* Degree in economics
* Several years of experience within a similar position within finance and/or automotive experience
* Solid understanding of financials KPIs
* Advanced MS Excel skills
* Fluency in business English and at least one of the Nordic languages



  





**To succeed in this role, we believe you are:** 



* Curious, self-driven and able to work under pressure
* Attentive to details and have good overall precision
* Analytical skills and willingness to crunch data
* Proactive with a future-oriented mindset
* Open and ready for extensive communication and collaboration with others



  





**What you can look forward to?** 




 Whatever your heart’s desire – in the BMW Group, you will find a wide range of departments and disciplines across the world where you can share your professional passion with us. As a BMW employee, everyone gets the opportunity to drive their own BMW or MINI on favorable terms.
 



  





 This is a permanent position located in modern facilities in Sollentuna and you will be reporting to the Head of Controlling. As a BMW employee, everyone gets the opportunity to drive their own BMW or MINI on favorable terms. If you find this interesting and you’re bringing the right mind-set in combination with a good skill set, please don’t hesitate to apply to the position.
 



  





 At BMW, we are driven by diversity, equity, and inclusion. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and are welcoming of all individuals, regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or disability. All shortlisted candidates will undergo testing (logical and personality tests) and background checks.

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Finance team (Stockholm)
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

 Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.
   

  

  





 We are looking for
 **senior SAP Finance professionals** 
 who have an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in finance area providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.
   

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:
   

  

  




* Thorough expertise in finance related SAP S/4HANA areas/competences such as Central Finance, FI/CO, Margin & Profitability Analysis, Project accounting with PS, Product Costing, Master Data modelling, Understanding of end to end process like Order to Cash, Procure to Pay or other
* Good understanding of SAP S/4HANA product roadmap (experience of other related SAP solutions such as e.g. Group Reporting, SAC is advantageous but not required) and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile) preferably with deployment experience e.g. global template rollouts
* Great addition (but not must) if the candidate has a high level understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW


 Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:
   

  

  

* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills, and an ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as an advantage but is not required.


**Additional Information**

**We offer**




 At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
   

  

 Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
   

  

**How to apply**




 Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
   

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* 
*https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/* 
  

  

**Questions?**




 For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se.
   

  

**We are looking forward to your application!** 
  

  

 For further information on Deloitte, please visit
 
 www.deloitte.se
   

  

  






**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Senior IT Consultant - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Consultants to collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or The Boston Consulting Group on national and international client projects! You will be independently structuring project modules and supporting junior project members. Together with our clients, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your sound technical know-how, your understanding of business contexts, and your analytical and conceptual skills.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, business or a related field with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, in the course of which you ran transformation and implementation projects in terms of both strategy and operations
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know exactly what the buzzwords machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile, AI, and robotics mean
* are familiar with all the stages of development for successful IT organizations and IT processes.
* know exactly how to put together complex business cases
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Form the digital transformation of globally leading companies while maintaining a clear view of overall technical solutions and client circumstances
* Drive groundbreaking projects forward by using agile methods and modern approaches within the scope of strategic IT implementation for clients and by actively steering the relevant modules
* Smooth the path for tailored, future-oriented customer journeys based on precise analysis of the situation and with current market developments and trends such as machine learning in mind
* Design and optimize unique IT architectures within the framework of enterprise solution requirements, modern custom software developments, and sustainable digital solutions, including cyber resilience


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: IT-Driftansvarig
description:
Vill du arbeta i en bred roll där du får kombinera operativt tekniskt arbete med strategisk överblick för framtidens IT-infrastruktur? Vi söker nu en IT-Driftansvarig som vill vara med och vidareutveckla en koncerngemensam IT-miljö i en växande organisation.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som IT-Driftansvarig blir du en nyckelperson i vårt IT-team. Du ansvarar för driften av vår IT-infrastruktur och har ett helhetsgrepp om leverans, support och säkerhet. Rollen innebär nära samarbete med verksamheten, IT-leverantörer och systemansvariga, samt resor till våra siter vid behov.
   

  

 Du arbetar både operativt – med support, beställningar, felsökning och installationer – och strategiskt med förvaltning, utveckling och förbättringsarbete.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter i urval:**
* Ansvara för drift och support av definierade IT-tjänster.
* Hantera Microsoftmiljön (Azure, AD, M365, Entra), brandväggar, nätverk och klienter.
* Koordinera samarbetet med externa IT-leverantörer.
* Genomföra och leda förvaltningsmöten.
* Leda och delta i projekt kopplade till uppgraderingar och implementeringar.
* Säkerställa efterlevnad av policys, riktlinjer och säkerhetskrav.
* Stötta med tekniska lösningar, förbättringsförslag och riskhantering.


**Din bakgrund**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT, teknik eller motsvarande.
* 3-5 års erfarenhet av IT-support och infrastruktur.
* Goda kunskaper i Microsoftmiljöer (t ex Azure, M365, AD)
* Erfarenhet av nätverk, säkerhet, klienthantering och supportverktyg.
* Erfarenhet från koncerngemensam IT-miljö eller IT-projekt.
* Certifieringar inom Microsoft, nätverk eller IT-säkerhet är meriterande.
* God vana att arbeta via remotekanaler - t ex Teams och styrningsklienter.


**Vem är du** 
 ?
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är serviceinriktad, lösningsorienterad och har en stark ansvarskänsla. Du är kommunikativ och strukturerad samt trivs i en roll där du både får jobba hands-on och med långsiktig utveckling. Vi erbjuder en viktig roll i en organisation där din insats gör verklig skillnad.
   

  

**Information** 
**om rollen**
 Rollen rapporterar till IT-chef och är placerad på vårt svenska huvudkontor i Kallhäll alternativt vid något av våra koncernbolags kontor i Sverige.
   

  

 Resor till koncernens lokala kontor förekommer.
   

  

 Sista dag för ansökan: 14 juni 2025
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med Din ansökan!

title: Systemintegratör
description:
🚀
 **Gå med i vårt team på VIPAS AB som en Systemintegratör, Test & Verifiering, fokus Mjukvara - Försvarsindustrin
 **,** 
**Stockholm** 
 !** 
 🚀
   

  

 Har du vad som krävs för att trivas i den dynamiska IT-konsultvärlden? VIPAS AB, ett växande företag, bjuder in dig att ta del av nästa spännande projekt som vår nya medarbetare!
   

  

**Om VIPAS:**
 Föreställ dig en värld där din affärsteknik är perfekt anpassad till dina mål – effektiv, skalbar och innovativ. På VIPAS AB är det precis vad vi strävar efter att skapa. Som ett IT-konsultföretag erbjuder vi inte bara tjänster, vi levererar skräddarsydda lösningar med hjälp av den senaste tekniken som Java och Python. Vårt team har gedigen erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling, DevOps och ingenjörskonst, och vi leder er genom den moderna teknikens landskap med trygghet och framförhållning.
   

  

****Jobbeskrivning:****
 Systemintegratör verifiering Din roll Kunden arbetar med komplexa system som bland annat sitter på plattformar som stridsflygplan och stridsfartyg, där du som Systemintegratör testar hela EW system med stort fokus på mjukvara. Här kommer du att delta i förberedelser, utförande, dokumentation och analys av deras systemtester, samtidigt som du stöttar med specialistkompetens när det behövs. Automatisering och utveckling för förbättring i deras miljö kommer att vara en naturlig del av din roll.
   

  

 Vidare kommer du att få utvärdera resultat från simuleringar samtidigt som du följer upp att hård- och mjukvara är i linje med kundens förväntningar. Ibland kan detta även innebära att du tillsammans med en utvecklingskollega får slå era kloka huvuden ihop, för att upptäcka och lösa eventuella problem som uppstår i systemet. En mindre del av arbetet kommer att kunna innebära besök hos kund periodvis.
   

  

 Du kommer ingå i ett sammansvetsat team som växer för att möta den stigande efterfrågan. Gruppen är välkomnande och värdesätter samarbete, positivitet och ödmjukhet! Resor förkommer i tjänsten.
   

  

**Din profil:**
 För att lyckas i den här rollen behöver du utöver en praktisk hårdvaru- och mjukvaruförmåga även ha en förmåga att strukturera, dokumentera och planera ditt arbete. Trivas med att gifta ihop hårdvara med mjukvara i säkra system. Vi hoppas att du har, har en positiv inställning och ett intresse att skapa goda samarbeten. Om du trivs med att utforska tekniska områden, ta itu med utmaningar inom världsledande teknik, då är du rätt person för oss. Vi ser även gärna att du har ett analytiskt och kvalitetsinriktat tänk genom ditt arbete.
   

  

**Vi s** 
**ö** 
**ker dig med:**
* Civil- eller Högskoleingenjörsexamen
* 3 års erfarenhet i rollen som Systemintegratör och/eller som Nätverksspecialist
* Erfarenhet som Nätverksingenjör och systemtekniker
* Arbetat med verifiering och har vana att skapa verifieringsrapporter
* Resa i tjänsten, både inrikes och utrikes.
* Goda kunskaper i både det svenska och engelska språket, såväl tal som skrift
* Kännedom om Försvarsindustrin (meriterande) Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav.


**Varför jobba hos oss?**
 VIPAS AB erbjuder attraktiva anställningspaket för IT-konsulter, i enlighet med Teknikföretagens (Almega) kollektivavtal. Att arbeta med oss innebär möjligheter inom olika branscher, vilket ger dig flexibilitet och möjligheter till utveckling. Om du är drivande och redo att anta nya utmaningar, är VIPAS familjen för dig!
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en del av ett innovativt team som driver framtiden inom telekom, fordon, detaljhandel och bank. Om du är redo att ta dig an utmanande projekt och växa i en banbrytande miljö, är detta möjligheten för dig!
   

  

**Ansök nu**
 Tveka inte att kontakta oss på kumud@vipas.se
   

  

**Observera:** 
 Ansök om du har
 **Sveriges citizenship**
**Hur ansöker du:**
 Intresserade kandidater uppmanas att skicka in sitt CV och personliga brev. Gå med oss och driv innovation på VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Observera att vi rekryterar löpande, vilket innebär att uppdraget kan stängas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Om du är intresserad rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omedelbart!

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Supply Chain team (Stockholm)
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  

  




**Job Description**

**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**




 Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.
   

  

  





 We are growing in the supply chain area and are looking for a SAP Supply Chain professional and/or SAP Procurement professional who has an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in the supply chain area (e.g S2P, SD, WM, IBP, GTS) providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.
   

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:
   

  

  




* Experience of SAP consulting / SAP SME / Stream lead / Project Manager roles in transformation projects, being the expert of one or several SAP process areas such as MM, SD, WM, IBP, GTS.
* A good understanding of end-to-end business processes, SAP best practices, and latest industry trends.
* A good understanding of the SAP product roadmap and experience of SAP S/4HANA and other SAP technologies.
* A deep understanding of various phases of project lifecycle (prepare, explore, realize, deploy) and a good understanding of S/4HANA product roadmap and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile)
* Have a team player attitude and hunger to develop new professional skills.
* Understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW


 Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:
   

  

  

* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with 5-10 years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Also, a background with at least some experience in leading and/or coordinating your own stream.
* Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders.
* Ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner.
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as advantage but not required.


**Additional Information**

**We offer**




 At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
   

  

 Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
   

  

**How to apply**




 Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
   

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* 
*https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/* 
  

  

**Questions?**




 For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se.
   

  

**We are looking forward to your application!** 
  

  

 For further information on Deloitte, please visit
 
 www.deloitte.se
   

  

  






**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: IT-Applikationsansvarig
description:
Vill du spela en nyckelroll i en växande organisation där din insats gör verklig skillnad? Nu söker vi en IT-Applikationsansvarig till vår IT organisation - en central roll i vår fortsatta digitala utveckling!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi är mitt i en spännande tillväxtresa där vårt affärssystem 4 PS står i centrum. Som IT-Applikationsansvarig blir du en nyckelperson i att säkerställa stabil drift, vidareutveckling och affärsnytta i våra system. Du blir en viktig del av vår IT-avdelning där vi tillsammans driver en verksamhetsnära agenda i en dynamisk och tillväxtorienterad miljö.
   

  

*Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden kommer att vara:*
* Ansvara för leverans och utveckling av olika applikationsrelaterade IT-tjänster.
* Operativt arbeta som systemspecialist med ansvar för behörigheter, servicefönster och riskhantering.
* Driva förvaltningsmöten, leda förändringsarbete och prioritera förbättringar tillsammans med systemägare och IT-chef.
* Initiera och leda förbättringsprojekt, uppgraderingar och integrationer.
* Ansvara för dokumentation, utbildningsmaterial och support (2nd-line).
* Säkerställa kvalitet vid förändringar samt följa upp användning och rapportering.


**Din bakgrund**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom systemvetenskap, ekonomi eller likvärdigt område.
* 3-5 års erfarenhet av affärssystem och god förståelse för ekonomiprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med och/eller leda systemrelaterade projekt samt samarbete med externa leverantörer.


**Vem är du** 
 ?
   

  

 Vi tror att du är strukturerad, drivande och har en naturlig förmåga att arbeta självständigt. Du är serviceinriktad och skapar lätt förtroendefulla relationer. Du trivs i en operativ roll men har även förmågan att hålla fokus på långsiktiga mål och milstolpar.
   

  

**Information** 
**om rollen**
 Placeringsort: Koncernhuvudkontoret i Kallhäll eller något av våra andra kontor i Sverige.
   

  

 Rollen rapporterar till IT-chef.
   

  

 Resor ut till koncernens olika kontor förekommer.
   

  

 Sista dag för ansökan 31 maj 2025
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med Din ansökan!

title: Cybersecurity Management Consultant
description:
Som ledande konsultbolag inom säker digitalisering och cybersäkerhet säkrar vi utvecklingen hos våra kunder varje dag. Vi erbjuder allt från strategisk rådgivning vid komplexa utmaningar till helhetsåtaganden inom cybersäkerhet och digitalisering. Vårt uppdrag är att skapa säkra IT-system och lösningar, effektivisera processer, skydda mot cyberhot, hantera lagkrav och bli mer hållbara i en digital värld.
   

  

 Vill du göra skillnad på riktigt och hjälpa organisationer att hantera digitala affärsrisker genom att skapa en röd tråd mellan affärsstrategier, lagar och regler samt teknikimplementationer? Då är du den vi söker!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker dig som har bred erfarenhet inom cybersäkerhet och informationssäkerhet – och som vill ta nästa steg i karriären mot rådgivning och uppdragsledning. Du kommer att axla en nyckelroll i våra uppdrag, där du kombinerar teknisk och strategisk kompetens med förmågan att leda andra och bygga förtroende hos kunder.
   

  

 I konsultrollen kommer du till exempel att arbeta som rådgivare, förändringsledare eller interim CSO/CISO, där du förväntas kunna driva arbetet med regelefterlevnad, riskhantering och ledningssystem från start till mål. Vi ser gärna att du trivs i nära samarbete med kund och skapar värde genom din närvaro och förståelse för kundens behov.
   

  

**Vi Ser Gärna Att Du Har**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av arbete inom informations- och cybersäkerhet
* Specialistkunskap inom regelefterlevnad (t.ex. DORA, FFFS, NIS2, GDPR)
* God erfarenhet av ramverk såsom ISO 27001, CIS och NIST
* Tidigare erfarenhet av förändringsledning eller verksamhetsutveckling
* Vana att ta ansvar för leveranser och kvalitet i uppdrag
* God förståelse för hur verksamhetsprocesser, riskhantering och informationssäkerhet samspelar
* Erfarenhet av att införa och utveckla ledningssystem för informationssäkerhet
* Akademisk examen inom relevant område
* Mycket god kommunikationsförmåga i båda svenska och engelska


**Meriterande Är Om Du Även Har**
* Certifieringar som CISSP, CISM eller liknande
* Konsulterfarenhet där du både haft operativt ansvar och bidragit till affärsutveckling
* Erfarenhet inom samhällsviktig verksamhet eller reglerade branscher


 Här får du en chans att leda vägen för hur våra kunder bygger motståndskraftiga, säkra och hållbara verksamheter.
   

  

**Vi satsar på dig**
 På Omegapoint sätter vi din kompetens i centrum och ger dig alla förutsättningar för ett utvecklande och varierat jobb. Som konsult hos oss tillbringar du vardagen i uppdrag hos våra kunder och har alltid en välkomnande hemmahamn på kontoret i centrala Stockholm. Här ordnar vi mängder av aktiviteter under året för att vi ska utvecklas och ligga i framkant. Det är en del i vår kompetenskultur som bygger på samarbete och en vilja att stärka varandra.
   

  

 Med en stor och varierande kundbas, från små specialistföretag till stora och välkända företag och myndigheter, har vi en möjlighet att utifrån just dina önskemål hitta utmanande och roliga uppdrag.
   

  

 Givetvis erbjuder vi även allt det andra som är viktigt, som marknadsmässiga löner, förstärkt föräldralön, anpassade förmånspaket, friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring och möjlighet till delägarskap.
   

  

 Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du kommer att trivas, utvecklas och ges alla möjligheter till en ljus framtid.
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan
 ****⤵️******
 Har några frågor kring tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta
 **petra.soderberg@omegapoint.se.**

title: Solution Architect
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Research Services
description:
As a Solution Architect within our Nordics services organization, your primary responsibility will be the design and architecting of technical solutions for clients based on customer analysis of the current ways of working.
 **This role can also be based in Gothenburg.**
 Dassault Systèmes, the 3DEXPERIENCE Company, provides businesses and people with virtual universes to imagine sustainable innovations. Our 3DEXPERIENCE platform leverages the Company’s world-leading 3D software applications to transform the way products are designed, produced, and supported. With its online architecture, the 3DEXPERIENCE environment helps businesses to test and evaluate — anywhere in the development lifecycle of a product or service — the eventual experience they will deliver to their customers. In short, 3DEXPERIENCE powers the next-generation capabilities that drive today’s Experience Economy.
   

  

**Role Description & Responsibilities**
* Define and propose a transformation path toward an integrated global solution, enabling the customer to achieve business objectives leveraging 3DS know-how and technologies powered by the 3DEXPERIENCE platform
* Coverage of the whole business processes with the expected business value while guaranteeing the final workability and relevancy of the solution specifically for manufacturing
* Create a solution that answers to the functional specification, scheduled delivery time, and proposed budget
* Work in areas related to ENOVIA, CATIA, DELMIA and integrations to handle different business scenarios
* Experience in BOM Management, Change Management, Variant Management, Classification, Process Engineering, integration with ERP, MES or other downstream systems etc
* Contribute with business consultant to capture customer business processes. Challenge customer business processes in regard to value creation and business transformation
* Assess customer opportunity in regards of feasibility, value and risks and deliver/support business and application consultant development of functional specifications to be implemented
* Leverage collaboration between 3DS organization around a common view of the solution architecture for project success and customer satisfaction
* Ensure the solution is proactively delivered through product implementation. Ensure to stick to out of the box solution implementation as much as possible and reduce unnecessary customizations


**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Solution Architect, Industry Process Consultant, or similar role, with consulting experience in PLM projects
* Strong expertise in designing and architecting technical solutions using 3DEXPERIENCE Software along with either ENOVIA, CATIA or DELMIA
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think strategically and analytically combined with excellent communication and presentation skills, able to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
* Good knowledge of industry standards & business processes
* Proficient in English and Swedish language


**What’s In It For You**
* An international and diverse working environment in a collaborative team
* Flexible working hours with hybrid working model, a good work-life balance and comprehensive benefits package
* Extensive skills and career development programs to build your journey with us


 Interested? Click on "Apply" to upload your application documents.
   

  

 Inclusion statement
   

  

 As a game-changer in sustainable technology and innovation, Dassault Systèmes is striving to build more inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. We believe that our people are our number one asset and we want all employees to feel empowered to bring their whole selves to work every day. It is our goal that our people feel a sense of pride and a passion for belonging. As a company leading change, it’s our responsibility to foster opportunities for all people to participate in a harmonized Workforce of the Future.

title: Senior IT Architect - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for Senior IT Architects to help our clients on national and international projects! (Senior) IT Architects are part of our consulting teams who focus for instance on tech-oriented analyses, review & specification of IT systems or architectures, technical solution design, process improvement and target architecture definitions. Together with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group, you will develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying your technical know-how combined with your analytical and conceptual skillset. Based on your IT project experience, you are able to provide content guidance to and coordinate smaller teams.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* completed a university degree in computer science, informatics, engineering, or a related discipline with higher-than-average grades
* bring a minimum of four years relevant experience in IT consulting, management of IT projects, or professional software development
* have led project teams of more than three people
* know that modern tools, such as machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile methods, AI, and robotics aren't just buzzwords - but essential to sustainable IT architectures
* are familiar with popular software development methods and tools
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts - while traveling to our clients in- and outside of your home country
* are on a fluent level of understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* You will form the digital transformation of globally leading companies, ensuring their success by evaluating our clients' digital capabilities and performing feasibility studies
* You will manage small, agile development teams in strategic IT implementation programs, establish modern practices like DevOps and CI/CD, and be responsible for the technical implementation of crucial digital requirements, such as cyber resilience
* You will analyze, develop, and optimize cutting-edge, customized IT architectures while leading small teams and applying your comprehensive understanding of legacy IT, enterprise solutions, and current market developments and trends such as cloud computing and microservices


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we cultivate a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description:
**The** 

 interest for flight simulation is soaring and so are we! Navigraph is currently looking for a Customer Support Specialist for our office in Gamla Stan, Stockholm (soon Norra Bantorget as we’ve grown out of our current office). At Navigraph we pride ourselves on the close relationship with our users. We interact with flight simulation pilots worldwide to collect feedback for product development, help with getting started, and ensure new pilots feel welcome in our community. This is your chance to be a part of a great team representing a brand users have known and loved for many years. 
 




  




**About Navigraph** 


 Navigraph is a world-leading SaaS company serving serious flight simulator pilots with charts, navigation data, and flight planning services. Our software, built on the latest technology, offers a unique user experience in flight simulation. Navigraph has a strong brand, dedicated users, established products, a great product/market fit, and a clear product roadmap. We are in an excellent position to grow and will provide you with all the means necessary to excel in your work. 
 





 We have a global crew of c. 45 aviation-loving professionals and growing. Our founders Magnus Axholt (CEO) and Stephen O’Connell (CTO) are still active in the company and our team thrives on creativity, experimentation, and collaboration. 
 





 Check out our career site for more information on who we are ✨. 
 




  




**What You’ll Do!** 


 As Customer Support Specialist you will join the Navigraph Support Team in providing first-line support to users via email, social media, and support forum. Typical inquiries relate to subscription and user account management, reimbursements, pre-purchase questions, and product feedback. In a typical month, the team handles 1,300 forum posts, 500 emails, and a varying amount of social media posts; however, we are expecting these numbers to grow. As a part of the team you will also create and maintain answers to frequently asked questions, and policy documents, to continuously evaluate the service level. 
 




  






 The Navigraph Support Team is divided into front-line and back-office support and comprises 13 individuals with varying expertise. The team members are typically also active within other company areas, such as community management, development, and user experience. The work hours are typically Swedish office hours.
 




  






 The team is evaluated on the number of tickets handled, initial response time, total resolution time, and customer satisfaction.
 




  




**What You’ll Need** 
* Fluency in English
* Strong written communication skills
* Previous work experience within customer support, hospitality, or sales.
* Experience with ZenDesk or similar issue tracking system
* Problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Empathy, patience and service-mindedness


**What we offer!** 


 A vibrant team where we have adopted a creative learning culture. Experimentation and innovation are strongly encouraged.  
 




  




* **Flexible hiring:** 

 On-site or hybrid. The position is based in Stockholm.
* **Work-Life Balance:** 

 Flexible hours and the freedom to work remotely
* **Perks:** 

 A great benefits package; please check out our career site.
* Growth Opportunities: We’ll support your professional development and give you the resources to excel.
* **Tech set-up:** 

 We’ll equip you with everything you need - including access to our very own in-house studio!
* **Memorable experiences:** 

 The Navigraph team is a tight-knit group with diverse backgrounds and experiences. We enjoy spending time together, and it is not uncommon for our yearly trips to flight simulator conventions in Europe and the U.S. to be combined with team-building activities that leave lasting impressions!



  




**How to Join the Team?** 


 We’re reviewing applications quickly - so don’t leave us hanging too long! 🚀✈️ Apply now!

title: Content Creator (Freelance)
description:
Beyond Alpha is a fast-growing natural food tech business selling across the United States, Australia and Europe. We specialize in formulating, producing and marketing gut, digestive and microbiome health foods and natural supplements, designed to help our clients make long-lasting positive health changes and start living very full lives again.
   

  

 We are looking for a Part Time Freelance Content Creator to manage our social media presence on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. You’ll be mainly responsible for producing content for our pages (videos, posts, etc.), managing the channels (uploading content, planning the strategy) etc.
   

  

 Why You'll Love Working at Beyond Alpha:
   

  

* Competitive Salary – Your skills and expertise deserve to be rewarded
* Work from Anywhere – Your home, a cozy café, or a beachside co-working space—it’s your call!
* Join a Supportive, Global Team – Work with passionate professionals from around the world
* Flexible Working Hours – Manage your schedule in a way that works best for you
* Exciting & Dynamic Work Environment – Every day brings new challenges and opportunities
* Make a Real Impact – Help create products that improve people’s lives


 Before you dive deeper, please note the following key points:
   

  

 📍This is a freelance fully remote part-time role
   

  

 📍We are seeking someone preferably with a background in B2C marketing
   

  

 📍Although the role is remote, the candidate must be available during EU hours (GMT)
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Produce original content for Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter (videos, graphics, captions, etc.)
* Develop and execute a content strategy aligned with brand goals
* Manage content scheduling, posting, and overall channel maintenance
* Monitor channel performance and suggest improvements
* Stay updated on social media trends, tools, and best practices


 Qualifications:
   

  

* Proven experience managing and creating content for social media platforms
* Background working with D2C e-commerce brands
* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities
* Strong understanding of audience engagement and content planning
* Experience collaborating with other creators and influencers
* Solid visual and written communication skills
* Self-motivated, deadline-driven, and full of fresh ideas
* Being a content creator is a strong plus (not mendatory)


 CVs must be in English
   

  

 Powered by JazzHR
   

  

 vm48CuoRgy

title: Lead Auditor - Information Security ISO 27001
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About Business Assurance**
 We help companies ensure compliance, build high-performing management systems, and meet competence needs within a wide range of industries. DNV helps companies understand Working with us, you can be involved in technically challenging and innovative projects worldwide demanding a broad variety of expertise. Our strong focus on research and innovation opens an array of opportunities, and allows you to engage in projects which develop next generation solutions. and manage their risk picture through our management system certification and training portfolios.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a result of further growth of our Business Assurance Unit in Sweden we are looking for qualified
 **Lead Auditors** 
 within the
 **Information Security ISO 27001** 
 area, preferably combined with ISO 9001.
   

  

**Your place of employment can be anywhere in Sweden, with visits to the client site.**
 As a
 **Lead Auditor** 
 you will be part of our team of auditors. Your assignments will be performing audits according to standards for information security – normally at the customer’s premises - in a wide variety of industries.
   

  

 You will be part of a professional team of colleagues with experience in many industries. As a Lead Auditor you will work both independently and in multidisciplinary teams.
   

  

**The Assignment May Include**
* Performing audits for Swedish and international clients
* Project management of larger certification projects
* Development of new services, training services, etc. on an ad hoc basis
* Supporting sales team and contributing to sales revenue.


 What we offer
   

  

 In DNV we are proud to lead the development in our main industries. Whether we work with some of the world’s leading companies to help solve some of their risk or safety challenges or we initiate joint industry projects to solve an industry-wide technical issue, we always aim to deliver expert insight and value to our customers and stakeholders. You will work with experts from a wide range of disciplines and build your competence, problem-solving abilities. It will broaden your view.
   

  

**We offer**
* A strong company culture with an emphasis on competence development
* Great colleagues who value teamwork and support
* Attractive total compensation package
* International working environment
* Flexible working hours and focus on work/life balance
* Interesting and challenging customers and projects, both national and international
* Be part of a world-leading company that has a global reach with more than 12 000 employees around to world and is headquartered in Norway.
* The possibility to grow and develop your competencies and ambitions within DNV.


**Requirements**
 About you
   

  

* Relevant educational background
